message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low. How about $11,000?
I'm still not comfortable with $11,000. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
